description: Good leg stretcher on the side of the TCH.   Within a minute or two from leaving your car you will come up to this unexpected but beautiful waterfall.  After the fence, follow the trail going downstream to the fall.  The rock formation is also really cool with some small openings to explore.
directions: The fall is located on Waterlook Brook.  Going north on the TCH, spot a guardrail 3.6km past the Kings Landing exit.  Park after the gurardrail ends and find the opening in the deer fence.
title: Joslin Falls
